entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uxbridge 08:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
